title: [Vipershroud, Murky Valley]
description: The moss hangs from the trees in long, blackish icicles, in some places dragging on the forest floor to mingle with the grayer moss there.  Unblinking pairs of golden eyes appear and disappear deep in the surrounding brambles, occasionally followed by a quiet rustling or a soft splashing.

The moss hangs from the trees in long, brownish icicles, in some places dragging on the forest floor to mingle with the greener moss there.  Unblinking pairs of golden eyes appear and disappear deep in the surrounding brambles, occasionally followed by a quiet rustling or a soft splashing.
